page.title: 09Shopping
page.content: In the 'd' block there are two shops, both of them{Post Offices.}The one in {Cutsdean}is in Skittle Alley and is run by three old ladies called the Misses Wright. They only sell stamps and sweets and handle Child Benefits. The other shop is in {Temple {Guiting}and is run by Mrs. Brennan. She sells general groceries,fruit and vegetables,Calor Gas as well as stamps,postal and money orders and sweets. For other food ,clothing and furniture most people travel 15 miles to either{Cheltenham}or{Evesham.}There are both morning(4.30{p.m!})and an evening delivery of newspapers and we also get weekly visits from a{ {fishmonger,a butcher}and three times weekly deliveries by the {baker}and the {milkman!}
